text: Hello everyone how are you, I'm having a weird problem with a module that I have created. Everything was going well until I saw it on safari. This is how I see it in chrome and so in safari, images seems to cut .  Do you know what it could be? i know safari has some problems with css and some scripts. But I would like to know if something happened to someone and if could solve it. Thank you !
The latest safari is like the new internet explorer...there are so many bugs. :face_with_peeking_eye:
